other_title: こみっくパーティー: Revolution (Japanese)
plot: Kazuki now lives on his own but still does his comics and has a part-time job. Mizuki learns to like cosplay but still not a big fan of otakus. We meet new characters and old minor characters get more air time. Unlike the first season there is no set plot or goal each episode is a story not connected to the next episode.
ending_theme: "Issho ni Kurasō" (一緒に暮らそう) by Emi Motoda
